data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Sherpur access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sherpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Sherpur, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 1,702 believers in Sherpur to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Sherpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Kori people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,358,300 souls in Sherpur and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 1,702 believers in the county of Sherpur.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.section_summary:
the county of Sherpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh has a population of 1,358,300.

We estimate Sherpur has 1,702 people who might know Jesus, 4,075 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,352,524 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 1,702 believers in Sherpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.
